import { React, useState } from "react"; import Search from "./Search"; export default function Furnitures() { const [selectedCat, setSelectedCat] = useState('all'); const [isSearch, setIsSearch] = useState(false); function handleCat(e) { setSelectedCat(e.target.value); } return (
setIsSearch(true)}>
{isSearch ? : ''}
) }
